name: Sound Barrier
description:
A nameless secret agent is given the order to infiltrate an invisible building- the walls around them only react to the sound of a special gun they carry at all times...

You have no self-defense, and the only way is up- can you sneak your way to the top of Barrier Tower and steal the confidential documents?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TAGD Fall 2020 Game Jam Submission

Theme: "Something's Missing"

Code, Sound, Art, Design by Michael Freaney

Special Thanks and shoutout to the members and officers of TAGD for making the semester bearable <3

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
